ai_estimate.title: AI Estimate Generator
ai_estimate.description: Generate a cost estimate by uploading an image (like an invoice or architecture diagram) or describing your infrastructure needs in the text box below.
ai_estimate.upload_label: Click to upload or drag and drop
ai_estimate.text_placeholder: e.g., 'I need two premium cloud servers with 4vCPU, 8GB RAM, and 100GB SSD each. Also, add a managed database with 2vCPU and 4GB RAM.'
ai_estimate.no_results: The AI could not identify any services from your request. Please try again with more details.

cloud_server.title: Cloud Server Calculator
cloud_server.description: Configure your virtual server specifications. Choose between high-performance AMD Gen 4 or versatile Intel Gen 2 chips.
cloud_server.desc: Chip: {chip}, Tier: {tier}, Billing: {billing}, {cpu} vCPU, {ram} GB RAM, {diskSize} GB {diskType} Disk
cloud_server.desc_hours: Chip: {chip}, Tier: {tier}, Billing: {billing} ({hours} hours), {cpu} vCPU, {ram} GB RAM, {diskSize} GB {diskType} Disk

database.title: Managed Database Calculator
database.description: Estimate costs for a managed database solution, including compute, storage, and optional backups.
database.desc: Tier: {tier}, {cpu} vCPU, {ram} GB RAM, {disk} GB Disk
database.desc_backup: Tier: {tier}, {cpu} vCPU, {ram} GB RAM, {disk} GB Disk, {backup} GB Backup

simple_storage.title: Simple Storage Calculator
simple_storage.description: Calculate object storage costs based on storage type, billing model, and data transfer.
simple_storage.desc: Type: {type}, Billing: {billing}, Storage: {storage} GB, Data Transfer: {transfer} GB

block_storage.title: Block Storage Calculator
block_storage.description: Calculate the cost of high-performance block storage volumes for your cloud servers.

load_balancer.title: Load Balancer Calculator
load_balancer.description: Choose a package based on connection needs and estimate data transfer overage costs.
load_balancer.desc_overage: Package: {name} ({connections} connections, {freeData}TB free transfer) + {overage} GB Overage

kubernetes.title: Kubernetes Engine Calculator
kubernetes.description: Estimate the management fee for your Kubernetes cluster. Note: This does not include worker node costs.
kubernetes.additional_costs_desc: The price above is for the Kubernetes management fee only. You will be billed separately for the Cloud Servers used as worker nodes.

kafka.title: Managed Kafka Calculator
kafka.description: Configure a managed Kafka cluster by specifying tier, compute, and storage resources.
kafka.desc: Tier: {tier}, {cpu} vCPU, {ram} GB RAM, {disk} GB Disk
kafka.desc_wan: Tier: {tier}, {cpu} vCPU, {ram} GB RAM, {disk} GB Disk + WAN IP

call_center.title: Cloud Call Center Calculator
call_center.description: Select a package for your cloud-based call center solution.

business_email.title: Business Email Calculator
business_email.description: Choose a business email package based on your storage and sending volume needs.

email.title: Email Transaction Calculator
email.description: Calculate costs for transactional emails via Shared or Dedicated IPs.

lms.title: LMS Solution Calculator
lms.description: Select a Learning Management System package based on concurrent users (CCU) and add storage if needed.
lms.storage_note: Billed in blocks of {blockSize} GB at {price} VNĐ/block.
lms.desc_additional: Package: {name} ({ccu} CCU, {storage} GB free storage) + {additional} GB additional storage

wan_ip.title: WAN IP Calculator
wan_ip.description: Add a public WAN IP address to your estimate. Choose between a monthly subscription or on-demand billing.
wan_ip.desc_subscription: WAN IP with monthly subscription billing.

snapshot.title: Snapshot Calculator
snapshot.description: Estimate the monthly cost for storing server volume snapshots based on their total size.

backup_schedule.title: Backup Schedule Calculator
backup_schedule.description: Add a fixed-price automated backup scheduling service to your estimate.
backup_schedule.fixed_price_note: This is a fixed-price service at {price} VNĐ/month for the scheduling feature. Storage costs for the snapshots themselves are calculated separately under the 'Snapshot' service.

custom_image.title: Custom Image Calculator
custom_image.description: Calculate the monthly cost for storing custom server images based on their total size.
